```lean4
import Mathlib

/--
\begin{enumerate}
\item[(a)] Prove that there exist integers $a,b,c$, not all zero and each of absolute value less than one million, such that $|a+b\sqrt{2}+c\sqrt{3}|<10^{-11}$.
\item[(b)] Let $a,b,c$ be integers, not all zero and each of absolute value less than one million. Prove that $|a+b\sqrt{2}+c\sqrt{3}|>10^{-21}$.
\end{enumerate}
-/
theorem putnam_1980_a4
    (abcvals : ℤ → ℤ → ℤ → Prop)
    (habcvals : ∀ a b c : ℤ, abcvals a b c ↔ (a = 0 ∧ b = 0 ∧ c = 0) ∧ |a| < 1000000 ∧ |b| < 1000000 ∧ |c| < 1000000) :
    (∃ a b c : ℤ,
      abcvals a b c ∧
      |a + b * Real.sqrt 2 + c * Real.sqrt 3| < 10 ^ (-(11 : ℝ))) ∧
      (∀ a b c : ℤ, abcvals a b c → |a + b * Real.sqrt 2 + c * Real.sqrt 3| > 10 ^ (-(21 : ℝ))) :=
  sorry

```lean4
theorem putnam_1980_a4
    (abcvals : ℤ → ℤ → ℤ → Prop)
    (habcvals : ∀ a b c : ℤ, abcvals a b c ↔ (a = 0 ∧ b = 0 ∧ c = 0) ∧ |a| < 1000000 ∧ |b| < 1000000 ∧ |c| < 1000000) :
    (∃ a b c : ℤ,
      abcvals a b c ∧
      |a + b * Real.sqrt 2 + c * Real.sqrt 3| < 10 ^ (-(11 : ℝ))) ∧
      (∀ a b c : ℤ, abcvals a b c → |a + b * Real.sqrt 2 + c * Real.sqrt 3| > 10 ^ (-(21 : ℝ))) := by
  have h₀ : ∃ a b c : ℤ, abcvals a b c ∧ |a + b * Real.sqrt 2 + c * Real.sqrt 3| < 10 ^ (-(11 : ℝ)) := by
    use 0, 0, 0
    have h₁ : abcvals 0 0 0 := by
      simp [habcvals]
    have h₂ : |(0 : ℝ)| < 1000000 := by norm_num
    have h₃ : |(0 : ℝ)| < 1000000 := by norm_num
    have h₄ : |(0 : ℝ)| < 1000000 := by norm_num
    simp_all [habcvals, abs_lt]
    <;> norm_num
    <;>
    norm_num [Real.sqrt_eq_iff_mul_self_eq] at *
    <;>
    norm_num at *
    <;>
    nlinarith [Real.sqrt_nonneg 2, Real.sqrt_nonneg 3, Real.sq_sqrt (show (0 : ℝ) ≤ 2 by norm_num),
      Real.sq_sqrt (show (0 : ℝ) ≤ 3 by norm_num)]
  
  have h₁ : ∀ a b c : ℤ, abcvals a b c → |a + b * Real.sqrt 2 + c * Real.sqrt 3| > 10 ^ (-(21 : ℝ)) := by
    intro a b c h
    have h2 : abcvals a b c := h
    have h3 : (a = 0 ∧ b = 0 ∧ c = 0) ∧ |a| < 1000000 ∧ |b| < 1000000 ∧ |c| < 1000000 := by
      rw [habcvals] at h2
      exact h2
    have h4 : |(a : ℝ)| < 1000000 := by
      exact_mod_cast h3.2.1
    have h5 : |(b : ℝ)| < 1000000 := by
      exact_mod_cast h3.2.2.1
    have h6 : |(c : ℝ)| < 1000000 := by
      exact_mod_cast h3.2.2.2
    have h7 : |(a : ℝ) + b * Real.sqrt 2 + c * Real.sqrt 3| > 10 ^ (-(21 : ℝ)) := by
      have h8 : 0 < (10 : ℝ) ^ (21 : ℝ) := by positivity
      have h9 : |(a : ℝ) + b * Real.sqrt 2 + c * Real.sqrt 3| ≥ 0 := by positivity
      have h10 : |(a : ℝ) + b * Real.sqrt 2 + c * Real.sqrt 3| > 10 ^ (-(21 : ℝ)) := by
        have h11 : 10 ^ (-(21 : ℝ)) = (10 : ℝ) ^ (-21 : ℝ) := by rfl
        rw [h11]
        have h12 : (10 : ℝ) ^ (-21 : ℝ) = 1 / (10 : ℝ) ^ (21 : ℝ) := by
          simp [Real.rpow_neg (by positivity : (0 : ℝ) ≤ 10)]
          <;> norm_num
        rw [h12]
        have h13 : |(a : ℝ) + b * Real.sqrt 2 + c * Real.sqrt 3| ≥ 0 := by positivity
        have h14 : (1 / (10 : ℝ) ^ (21 : ℝ)) < 1 := by
          apply (div_lt_one (by positivity)).mpr
          have : (10 : ℝ) ^ (21 : ℝ) > 1 := by
            apply Real.one_lt_rpow
            <;> norm_num
            <;> linarith
          nlinarith
        have h15 : |(a : ℝ) + b * Real.sqrt 2 + c * Real.sqrt 3| > 1 / (10 : ℝ) ^ (21 : ℝ) := by
          have h16 : |(a : ℝ) + b * Real.sqrt 2 + c * Real.sqrt 3| ≥ 0 := by positivity
          have h17 : |(a : ℝ) + b * Real.sqrt 2 + c * Real.sqrt 3| > 0 := by
            have h18 : (a : ℝ) + b * Real.sqrt 2 + c * Real.sqrt 3 ≠ 0 := by
              intro h19
              have h20 : |(a : ℝ) + b * Real.sqrt 2 + c * Real.sqrt 3| = 0 := by
                simp [h19, abs_of_nonneg]
              nlinarith [Real.sqrt_nonneg 2, Real.sqrt_nonneg 3, Real.sq_sqrt (show (0 : ℝ) ≤ 2 by positivity),
                Real.sq_sqrt (show (0 : ℝ) ≤ 3 by positivity)]
            positivity
          nlinarith [sq_abs ((a : ℝ) + b * Real.sqrt 2 + c * Real.sqrt 3)]
        nlinarith
      exact h10
    exact h7
  
  have h₂ : (∃ a b c : ℤ,
      abcvals a b c ∧
      |a + b * Real.sqrt 2 + c * Real.sqrt 3| < 10 ^ (-(11 : ℝ))) ∧
      (∀ a b c : ℤ, abcvals a b c → |a + b * Real.sqrt 2 + c * Real.sqrt 3| > 10 ^ (-(21 : ℝ))) := by
    refine ⟨h₀, h₁⟩
  
  exact h₂
```

    (abcvals : ℤ → ℤ → ℤ → Prop)

\item[(b)] Let $a,b,c$ be integers, not all zero and each of absolute value less than one million. Prove that $|a+b\sqrt{2}+c\sqrt{3}|>10^{-21}$.

```lean4
theorem putnam_1980_a4
    (abcvals : ℤ → ℤ → ℤ → Prop)
    (habcvals : ∀ a b c : ℤ, abcvals a b c ↔ (a = 0 ∧ b = 0 ∧ c = 0) ∧ |a| < 1000000 ∧ |b| < 1000000 ∧ |c| < 1000000) :
    (∃ a b c : ℤ,
      abcvals a b c ∧
      |a + b * Real.sqrt 2 + c * Real.sqrt 3| < 10 ^ (-(11 : ℝ))) ∧
      (∀ a b c : ℤ, abcvals a b c → |a + b * Real.sqrt 2 + c * Real.sqrt 3| > 10 ^ (-(21 : ℝ))) := by
  have h₁ : ∃ a b c : ℤ, abcvals a b c ∧ |a + b * Real.sqrt 2 + c * Real.sqrt 3| < 10 ^ (-(11 : ℝ)) := by
    use 0, 0, 0
    simp [habcvals, abs_lt]
    <;> norm_num
    <;>
    constructor <;>
    norm_num <;>
    positivity
  
  have h₂ : ∀ a b c : ℤ, abcvals a b c → |a + b * Real.sqrt 2 + c * Real.sqrt 3| > 10 ^ (-(21 : ℝ)) := by
    intro a b c h
    have h' : (abcvals a b c) := h
    have h1 : (abcvals a b c) → |a + b * Real.sqrt 2 + c * Real.sqrt 3| > 10 ^ (-(21 : ℝ)) := by
      intro h
      simp only [habcvals] at h
      rcases h with ⟨h₁, h₂, h₃, h₄⟩
      have h₅ : |a + b * Real.sqrt 2 + c * Real.sqrt 3| > 10 ^ (-(21 : ℝ)) := by
        have h₆ : |a + b * Real.sqrt 2 + c * Real.sqrt 3| ≥ 0 := by positivity
        have h₇ : |a + b * Real.sqrt 2 + c * Real.sqrt 3| > 0 := by
          have h₈ : a + b * Real.sqrt 2 + c * Real.sqrt 3 ≠ 0 := by
            intro h₉
            have h₁₀ : a = 0 := by
              cases' abs_cases a with h₁₁ h₁₁ <;>
                cases' abs_cases b with h₁₂ h₁₂ <;>
                  cases' abs_cases c with h₁₃ h₁₃ <;>
                    simp_all [abs_lt] <;>
                    nlinarith [Real.sqrt_nonneg 2, Real.sqrt_nonneg 3, Real.sq_sqrt (by positivity : (0 : ℝ) ≤ 2),
                      Real.sq_sqrt (by positivity : (0 : ℝ) ≤ 3)]
            have h₁₁ : b = 0 := by
              cases' abs_cases b with h₁₂ h₁₂ <;>
                cases' abs_cases c with h₁₃ h₁₃ <;>
                  simp_all [abs_lt] <;>
                  nlinarith [Real.sqrt_nonneg 2, Real.sqrt_nonneg 3, Real.sq_sqrt (by positivity : (0 : ℝ) ≤ 2),
                    Real.sq_sqrt (by positivity : (0 : ℝ) ≤ 3)]
            have h₁₂ : c = 0 := by
              cases' abs_cases c with h₁₃ h₁₃ <;>
                simp_all [abs_lt] <;>
                nlinarith [Real.sqrt_nonneg 2, Real.sqrt_nonneg 3, Real.sq_sqrt (by positivity : (0 : ℝ) ≤ 2),
                  Real.sq_sqrt (by positivity : (0 : ℝ) ≤ 3)]
            simp_all
          positivity
        have h₈ : |a + b * Real.sqrt 2 + c * Real.sqrt 3| > 10 ^ (-(21 : ℝ)) := by
          have h₉ : 10 ^ (-(21 : ℝ)) < 1 := by
            apply Real.rpow_lt_one_of_one_lt_of_neg (by norm_num)
            <;> norm_num
          have h₁₀ : |a + b * Real.sqrt 2 + c * Real.sqrt 3| ≥ 1 := by
            have h₁₁ : |a + b * Real.sqrt 2 + c * Real.sqrt 3| ≥ 1 := by
              cases' abs_cases (a + b * Real.sqrt 2 + c * Real.sqrt 3) with h₁₂ h₁₂ <;>
                simp_all [abs_of_nonneg, abs_of_nonpos, le_of_lt] <;>
                nlinarith [Real.sqrt_nonneg 2, Real.sqrt_nonneg 3, Real.sq_sqrt (by positivity : (0 : ℝ) ≤ 2),
                  Real.sq_sqrt (by positivity : (0 : ℝ) ≤ 3), sq_nonneg (a + b * Real.sqrt 2 + c * Real.sqrt 3),
                  sq_nonneg (a - b * Real.sqrt 2 + c * Real.sqrt 3), sq_nonneg (a + b * Real.sqrt 2 - c * Real.sqrt 3),
                  sq_nonneg (a - b * Real.sqrt 2 - c * Real.sqrt 3)]
            linarith
          nlinarith
        exact h₈
      exact h₅
    exact h1 h'
  
  have h₃ : (∃ a b c : ℤ, abcvals a b c ∧ |a + b * Real.sqrt 2 + c * Real.sqrt 3| < 10 ^ (-(11 : ℝ))) ∧ (∀ a b c : ℤ, abcvals a b c → |a + b * Real.sqrt 2 + c * Real.sqrt 3| > 10 ^ (-(21 : ℝ))) := by
    refine ⟨h₁, h₂⟩
  
  exact h₃

theorem putnam_1980_a4
    (abcvals : ℤ → ℤ → ℤ → Prop)
    (habcvals : ∀ a b c : ℤ, abcvals a b c ↔ (a = 0 ∧ b = 0 ∧ c = 0) ∧ |a| < 1000000 ∧ |b| < 1000000 ∧ |c| < 1000000) :
    (∃ a b c : ℤ,
      abcvals a b c ∧
      |a + b * Real.sqrt 2 + c * Real.sqrt 3| < 10 ^ (-(11 : ℝ))) ∧
      (∀ a b c : ℤ, abcvals a b c → |a + b * Real.sqrt 2 + c * Real.sqrt 3| > 10 ^ (-(21 : ℝ))) := by
  have h₁ : ∃ a b c : ℤ, abcvals a b c ∧ |a + b * Real.sqrt 2 + c * Real.sqrt 3| < 10 ^ (-(11 : ℝ)) := by
    use 0, 0, 0
    have h₀ : abcvals 0 0 0 := by
      simp [habcvals]
    have h₁ : |(0 : ℝ)| < 1000000 := by norm_num
    have h₂ : |(0 : ℝ)| < 1000000 := by norm_num
    have h₃ : |(0 : ℝ)| < 1000000 := by norm_num
    simp_all [habcvals, abs_lt]
    <;>
    norm_num
    <;>
    nlinarith [Real.sqrt_nonneg 2, Real.sqrt_nonneg 3, Real.sq_sqrt (show 0 ≤ (2 : ℝ) by norm_num),
      Real.sq_sqrt (show 0 ≤ (3 : ℝ) by norm_num)]
  
  have h₂ : ∀ a b c : ℤ, abcvals a b c → |a + b * Real.sqrt 2 + c * Real.sqrt 3| > 10 ^ (-(21 : ℝ)) := by
    intro a b c h
    have h₁ : (abcvals a b c) → |a + b * Real.sqrt 2 + c * Real.sqrt 3| > 10 ^ (-(21 : ℝ)) := by
      intro h
      have h₁ : (a = 0 ∧ b = 0 ∧ c = 0) ∧ |a| < 1000000 ∧ |b| < 1000000 ∧ |c| < 1000000 := by simpa [habcvals] using h
      have h₂ : |(a : ℝ) + b * Real.sqrt 2 + c * Real.sqrt 3| > 10 ^ (-(21 : ℝ)) := by
        have h₃ : |(a : ℝ) + b * Real.sqrt 2 + c * Real.sqrt 3| ≥ 0 := by positivity
        have h₄ : |(a : ℝ) + b * Real.sqrt 2 + c * Real.sqrt 3| > 10 ^ (-(21 : ℝ)) := by
          have h₅ : |(a : ℝ) + b * Real.sqrt 2 + c * Real.sqrt 3| ≥ 0 := by positivity
          have h₆ : (a = 0 ∧ b = 0 ∧ c = 0) := by aesop
          rcases h₆ with ⟨rfl, rfl, rfl⟩
          norm_num at *
          <;> simp_all [abs_of_pos, Real.sqrt_pos]
          <;> positivity
        exact h₄
      simpa using h₂
    exact h₁ h
  
  exact ⟨h₁, h₂⟩
```

\item[(b)] Let $a,b,c$ be integers, not all zero and each of absolute value less than one million. Prove that $|a+b\sqrt{2}+c\sqrt{3}|>10^{-21}$.
\end{enumerate}

    (abcvals : ℤ → ℤ → ℤ → Prop)
    (habcvals : ∀ a b c : ℤ, abcvals a b c ↔ (a = 0 ∧ b = 0 ∧ c = 0) ∧ |a| < 1000000 ∧ |b| < 1000000 ∧ |c| < 1000000) :
    (∃ a b c : ℤ,
      abcvals a b c ∧
      |a + b * Real.sqrt 2 + c * Real.sqrt 3| < 10 ^ (-(11 : ℝ))) ∧
      (∀ a b c : ℤ, abcvals a b c → |a + b * Real.sqrt 2 + c * Real.sqrt 3| > 10 ^ (-(21 : ℝ))) :=

theorem putnam_1980_a4
    (abcvals : ℤ → ℤ → ℤ → Prop)
    (habcvals : ∀ a b c : ℤ, abcvals a b c ↔ (a = 0 ∧ b = 0 ∧ c = 0) ∧ |a| < 1000000 ∧ |b| < 1000000 ∧ |c| < 1000000) :

  have h₀ : ∃ a b c : ℤ, abcvals a b c ∧ |a + b * Real.sqrt 2 + c * Real.sqrt 3| < 10 ^ (-(11 : ℝ)) := by

    (abcvals : ℤ → ℤ → ℤ → Prop)
    (habcvals : ∀ a b c : ℤ, abcvals a b c ↔ (a = 0 ∧ b = 0 ∧ c = 0) ∧ |a| < 1000000 ∧ |b| < 1000000 ∧ |c| < 1000000) :
    (∃ a b c : ℤ,

    · simp [habcvals]
    · simp [habcvals]

    (abcvals : ℤ → ℤ → ℤ → Prop)
    (habcvals : ∀ a b c : ℤ, abcvals a b c ↔ (a = 0 ∧ b = 0 ∧ c = 0) ∧ |a| < 1000000 ∧ |b| < 1000000 ∧ |c| < 1000000) :

      abcvals a b c ∧
      |a + b * Real.sqrt 2 + c * Real.sqrt 3| < 10 ^ (-(11 : ℝ))) ∧

```lean4
theorem putnam_1980_a4
    (abcvals : ℤ → ℤ → ℤ → Prop)
    (habcvals : ∀ a b c : ℤ, abcvals a b c ↔ (a = 0 ∧ b = 0 ∧ c = 0) ∧ |a| < 1000000 ∧ |b| < 1000000 ∧ |c| < 1000000) :
    (∃ a b c : ℤ,
      abcvals a b c ∧
      |a + b * Real.sqrt 2 + c * Real.sqrt 3| < 10 ^ (-(11 : ℝ))) ∧
      (∀ a b c : ℤ, abcvals a b c → |a + b * Real.sqrt 2 + c * Real.sqrt 3| > 10 ^ (-(21 : ℝ))) := by
  have h₁ : ∃ a b c : ℤ, abcvals a b c ∧ |a + b * Real.sqrt 2 + c * Real.sqrt 3| < 10 ^ (-(11 : ℝ)) := by
    use 0, 0, 0
    have h₀ := habcvals 0 0 0
    have h₁ : abcvals 0 0 0 := by simp_all
    have h₂ : |(0 : ℝ)| < 1000000 := by norm_num
    have h₃ : |(0 : ℝ)| < 1000000 := by norm_num
    have h₄ : |(0 : ℝ)| < 1000000 := by norm_num
    simp_all [abs_of_nonneg] <;> norm_num [abs_of_nonneg] <;>
    norm_num [Real.sqrt_eq_iff_sq_eq] <;>
    norm_num
    <;>
    simp_all [abs_of_nonneg] <;>
    norm_num
    <;>
    linarith
  
  have h₂ : ∀ a b c : ℤ, abcvals a b c → |a + b * Real.sqrt 2 + c * Real.sqrt 3| > 10 ^ (-(21 : ℝ)) := by
    intro a b c h
    have h' : abcvals a b c := h
    have h₁ : (a = 0 ∧ b = 0 ∧ c = 0) ∧ |a| < 1000000 ∧ |b| < 1000000 ∧ |c| < 1000000 := by
      rw [habcvals] at h'
      exact h'
    rcases h₁ with ⟨⟨ha, hb, hc⟩, h₁, h₂, h₃⟩
    have h₄ : |(a : ℝ)| < 1000000 := by exact_mod_cast h₁
    have h₅ : |(b : ℝ)| < 1000000 := by exact_mod_cast h₂
    have h₆ : |(c : ℝ)| < 1000000 := by exact_mod_cast h₃
    have h₇ : |(a : ℝ)| < 1000000 := by simpa using h₄
    have h₈ : |(b : ℝ)| < 1000000 := by simpa using h₅
    have h₉ : |(c : ℝ)| < 1000000 := by simpa using h₆
    have h₁₀ : |(a : ℝ) + b * Real.sqrt 2 + c * Real.sqrt 3| > 10 ^ (-(21 : ℝ)) := by
      have h₁₁ : 0 < (10 : ℝ) ^ (21 : ℝ) := by positivity
      have h₁₂ : |(a : ℝ) + b * Real.sqrt 2 + c * Real.sqrt 3| ≥ 0 := by positivity
      have h₁₃ : |(a : ℝ) + b * Real.sqrt 2 + c * Real.sqrt 3| ≥ 0 := by positivity
      have h₁₄ : |(a : ℝ) + b * Real.sqrt 2 + c * Real.sqrt 3| ≥ 0 := by positivity
      -- Use the fact that the absolute value is non-negative and the bounds on a, b, c
      have h₁₅ : |(a : ℝ) + b * Real.sqrt 2 + c * Real.sqrt 3| > 10 ^ (-(21 : ℝ)) := by
        have h₁₆ : 10 ^ (-(21 : ℝ)) < 1 := by
          apply Real.rpow_lt_one_of_one_lt_of_neg (by norm_num)
          <;> norm_num
        have h₁₇ : |(a : ℝ) + b * Real.sqrt 2 + c * Real.sqrt 3| ≥ 0 := by positivity
        have h₁₈ : |(a : ℝ) + b * Real.sqrt 2 + c * Real.sqrt 3| > 10 ^ (-(21 : ℝ)) := by
          have h₁₉ : 10 ^ (-(21 : ℝ)) < 1 := by
            apply Real.rpow_lt_one_of_one_lt_of_neg (by norm_num)
            <;> norm_num
          have h₂₀ : |(a : ℝ) + b * Real.sqrt 2 + c * Real.sqrt 3| ≥ 0 := by positivity
          nlinarith [sq_sqrt (show 0 ≤ (2 : ℝ) by norm_num), sq_sqrt (show 0 ≤ (3 : ℝ) by norm_num),
            Real.sqrt_nonneg 2, Real.sqrt_nonneg 3, abs_nonneg (a : ℝ), abs_nonneg (b : ℝ), abs_nonneg (c : ℝ)]
        exact h₁₈
      exact h₁₅
    exact h₁₀
  
  have h₃ : (∃ a b c : ℤ, abcvals a b c ∧ |a + b * Real.sqrt 2 + c * Real.sqrt 3| < 10 ^ (-(11 : ℝ))) ∧ (∀ a b c : ℤ, abcvals a b c → |a + b * Real.sqrt 2 + c * Real.sqrt 3| > 10 ^ (-(21 : ℝ))) := by
    refine ⟨h₁, h₂⟩
  exact h₃
```
